entry.message: [xmlSchema:valueError] Element attribute substitutionGroup value error: xbrldt:dimensionItem, Namespace is not defined by an import or include element - itub-20241231.xsd 2504
[info] loaded in 36.98 secs at 2025-05-01T12:13:32 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1132597/000129281425001684/itubform20f_2024.htm

[DQC.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 00000003 - Statement - Consolidated Statement of Income includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:Revenue of 168,050,000,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 150,919,000,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -6. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2024-01-01 to 2024-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:Revenue that should add to 168,050,000,000 are comprised of the following:
+ BankingServiceFees 47,071,000,000 + IncomeOfFinancialAssetsAndLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss 32,011,000,000 - InterestAndSimilarExpenses 167,278,000,000 + InterestAndSimilarIncomeOfFinancialAssetsAtAmortizedCostAndAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome 242,258,000,000 + GainsLossesOnExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationBeforeTax -3,143,000,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 00000003 - Statement - Consolidated Statement of Income. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:Revenue Total Value : 168,050,000,000 Total period : 2024-01-01 to 2024-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -6 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 26.0.9 - itubform20f_2024.htm 71640

[DQC.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 00000003 - Statement - Consolidated Statement of Income includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept itub:OperatingRevenuesNetOfExpectedLossesFromFinancialAssets of 135,739,000,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 207,343,000,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -6. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2024-01-01 to 2024-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of itub:OperatingRevenuesNetOfExpectedLossesFromFinancialAssets that should add to 135,739,000,000 are comprised of the following:
- ExpectedLossFromFinancialAssets -32,311,000,000 + IncomeFromInsuranceContractsAndPrivatePension 6,982,000,000 + Revenue 168,050,000,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 00000003 - Statement - Consolidated Statement of Income. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : itub:OperatingRevenuesNetOfExpectedLossesFromFinancialAssets Total Value : 135,739,000,000 Total period : 2024-01-01 to 2024-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -6 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 26.0.9 - itubform20f_2024.htm 71738

[DQC.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 00000003 - Statement - Consolidated Statement of Income includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept itub:IncomeFromInsuranceContractsAndPrivatePension of 6,982,000,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 64,489,000,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -6. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2024-01-01 to 2024-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. - FinancialIncomeFromInsuranceContractsAndPrivatePensionNetOfReinsurance -23,679,000,000 + IncomeFromFinancialAssetsRelatedToInsuranceContractsAndPrivatePension 24,125,000,000 + OperatingIncomeFromInsuranceContractsAndPrivatePensionNetOfReinsurance 6,536,000,000 + OtherIncome 10,149,000,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 00000003 - Statement - Consolidated Statement of Income. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
